summary: An Ordinance amending Section four (4) of Ordinance No. 16517, entitled "An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Harvard Avenue North, from East Lynn Street to Roanoke Street, in the City of Seattle, by grading and constructing sidewalks under Ordinance No. 15049, creating Local Improvement District No. 1364, prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement, and repealing Ordinance No. 16392, approved July 1st, 1907, approved July 15th, 1907.
